name:
Shoppers can indulge in a refreshing dining experience in Manar Mall’s charming ambience.

Explore, take a break and enjoy a unique experience in Shopping Mall dining. Whether it’s a quick snack on the run, a healthy salad to re-charge or a fun casual dining experience the restaurant outlets at Manar Mall will offer all.

name:
Opened in the September of 2000, Manar Mall caters to be the most popular m and leisure center in RAK.

Built on the spectacular landscape-facing sea corniche on one side and convenient parking on the other, it m variety of time spending to everyone.

Customers are offered cafes and restaurants with outdoor siting area, facing the sea, playgrounds for children, 120 retail outlets and several anchor stores.

name:
